Text: Valero at Enron Job Fair on FridayPST Hey guys just thought I would let you know that Valero is going to be at the Job Fair this Friday at Enron Field from and I will be one of the people attending it to represent us So if you are going to be there make sure you come by and at least say hello Plus depending on when my flight back is going to be and how soon I can leave the Fair we plan on going somewhere and getting a couple of drinks So come by drop off a resume and maybe we can get some drinks Note If you are interested in Valero there is a very good possibility that the Director of MidOffice will be attending as well and it would be a good chance for an informal interview Hope everybody is doing alright and pass the word on to anybody I may have missed Kyle

Re I NEED A JOBSorry bro I guess I dont have you in my address book I included people that were in my hotmail address book I actually have been twice since we went Once for a bachelor party that was crazy and then a couple of weeks ago when I only got hours of sleep the whole weekend The last time was pretty cool because we played Texas Holdem the whole time out there I had never played poker in Vegas before but it was pretty fun Anyway I just thought I would see if any of you guys need a hook up Take care man Kyle Love Phillip M To PhillipMLove cc enroncom Subject I NEED A JOB PM what is up with leaving me off the email this morning You dont want me to come work for you too My feelings were hurt Hope things are going well in San Antonio We need to get back to Vegas so I can gamble away what is left of my retirement PL This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
